summary:
Use the Nexus Mod Manager to grab this.
An interactive FOMOD file created for easy installation of Devalinor\'s various Weapon and Armor sets (through the Nexus Mod Manager). :)
descriptionHtml:
[b]This is a temporary upload, so Devalinor can preview the package. :D[/b]

This a repackage of Devalinor\'s Glass Weapons and Armor (found here! [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=526]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=526[/url]).
This provides install options for Nexus Mod Manager users.
author: MOD by Devalinor - FOMOD by SquishE

files.name: Devalinors Glass Armor and Weapons FOMOD
files.fileName: Devalinors Glass Armor and Weapons FOMOD-3640-1-0-2-0.7z
